description:
My place is close to Great shopping and food locations! Village and LES steps away! Katz's Delicatessen, Cafe Habana, Balthazar...etc. You’ll love my place because of the ambiance, the neighborhood, and the people. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families (with kids), and big groups.

My space is conveniently located on the ground floor so you dont have to walk up any annoying stairs! Located on a very quiet block with a very friendly atmosphere!

The whole apartment will be yours to access.

I won't be in the apartment but will be available in case you need me for any questions. Feel free to ask me anything about the city.

The most trendy and eclectic neighborhood any traveller can stay at. Feel like a cozy environment away from the load areas.

Minutes walking to public transportation! Explore NYC on foot or subway!
name: Village 2BR Excellence!
review: My family and I stayed two nights here. The apartment is easy to find and the key access is very convenient. The location is excellent!! Ob is very helpful and quick at getting in touch. We had good communication. Definitely worth the money and the stay!
